title: feat: use unprotected news branch for gist data
author: ElliotEtag

gist.headline: News bot gets its own lane
gist.blurb: Our social media bot now writes to a dedicated branch, keeping the main branch safe and sound.
gist.summary: Redirected automated social media data commits to an unprotected 'news' branch to bypass main branch protection rules.
gist.impact: Ensures the social media automation runs reliably without hitting permission errors on the main branch.
gist.visual_concept: The bee mascot sorting files into a specific 'news' bin, separating them from the main pile.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot sorting colorful data envelopes into a special box labeled 'NEWS'. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'SORTED'. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, soft pastel gradients, warm lighting, retro gaming vibes.
